Description.Text: Nice, the capital of the French Riviera, has always been the playground of the rich and famous. During the vibrant era known as the Belle Epoque, the beau monde leisurely strolled along the Boulevard facing the tranquil blue sea.That opulent period lives on today in the exquisite Hotel Atlantic, a superb Boscolo First Class hotel in Nice. The magnificent lobby with its luminous decorated glass ceiling, fine antiques and tasteful floral arrangements and the gracious welcome of the courteous staff are just a prelude of what you will find in this refined world. Your residence at the Hotel Atlantic is a splendid haven of comfort and privacy. All of the 122 spacious rooms have beautiful furnishings, Art Deco touches and deluxe accessories and are tastefully decorated in the luminous colors of Provence. In this luxurious ambiance that evokes memories of the past you can also enjoy the high-tech present and future with modern comforts such as satellite and pay TV, Internet access and more. If you'd like room service or if anything else comes to mind, just pick up the phone and the courteous staff will be delighted to help you.
